title: Ep. 607 - What Leftists Mean When They Say 'Unity'
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, a New York Times writer says he’s given up on reaching out to Trump voters after all of his outreach efforts failed. But we can learn something important about the leftist mentality from the way he went about this “outreach.” Also Five Headlines including a press conference held by Trump’s lawyers, laying out their voter fraud claims. Tucker Carlson says that one of the lawyers, Sidney Powell, has refused to provide any of the evidence she claims to have. We’ll try to make sense of all of that today. And in our Daily Cancellation, New York Magazine produces one of the most racist videos you will ever see in your life. We’ll play that today and of course, cancel everyone involved.
If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/walsh
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
